name: @nnao45/jsq-esm-test
description: JavaScript-Powered JSON Query CLI Tool (ESM Test)

scripts.build:esm: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node16 --outfile=dist/index.mjs --format=esm --packages=external --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
